Plot: A mystery outside of San Francisco brings together small-town sheriff Paul Del Moral, Japanese author Aki Akahori, and a traveler from Reno who soon disappears, leaving behind his suitcase and a trail of questions.
Title: Man from Reno
Writer: Dave Boyle, Joel Clark, Michael Lerman
Actors: Ayako Fujitani, Pepe Serna, Kazuki Kitamura, Yasuyo Shiba
